persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 61-year-old full-time crypto trader, combines over three decades of financial expertise with a meticulous, detail-oriented approach to the digital currency market. Despite the ever-evolving nature of cryptocurrencies, Sage's traditional and frugal mindset ensures a disciplined, risk-averse strategy, focusing on long-term gains and thorough analysis. As an expert in the field, Sage's cautious yet calculated methods have earned them a reputation for reliability and success in the volatile world of crypto trading.
